name: Bunny The Ghost Buster
description:
Game developed for the GodotWildJam for the theme ghosts. This is not a final game.

Play as a steam punk rabbit ghost buster. Collect orbs and find your way to the end of the levels. Careful with the ghosts...they are SCARY!!

Play with a controller or with keyboard plus mouse (A,D to move, Space and Shift to jump and dash, LMB to fire)

We wanted to make more levels, but we didn't have time.

Credits:

Code by erebrus

Art by Aokomi, plus itch assets for the tileset.

Sound by TheDrLee (https://itch.io/profile/thedrlee)
